data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Along the Pews.
The alter faces west so the rising sun hits the cross just right each morning. The bejeweled cloth that lay over the alter sparkle and the room practically glows.
There's a peasant dress, a priceless painting, and some peasant shoes here.

You are carrying a bible and a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I need to get to the priceless painting so I can keep it
data.mid_motivation: I have to get to the alter to see the painting
data.long_motivation: I'm carrying the painting to the store at the end of the day
